org.ops4j.peaberry
Interface ServiceScope

All Known Subinterfaces:
ServiceRegistry
public interface ServiceScope

A dynamic collection of exported services with associated attributes.

Service scopes can be nested - when a service is exported to a scope, it is automatically exported to any contained ServiceScope instances that have scope.filter attributes that match the exported service.

Field Summary
static String SCOPE_FILTER
          scope.filter attribute, an RFC-1960 LDAP filter that defines which services can be exported to the associated ServiceScope instance.
 
Method Summary
<S,T extends S>
Export<S>
export(T service, Map<String,?> attributes)
          Export the given service to this scope with the associated attributes.
 

Field Detail

scope.filter attribute, an RFC-1960 LDAP filter that defines which services can be exported to the associated ServiceScope instance.

Method Detail

export

<S,T extends S> Export<S> export(T service,
                                 Map<String,?> attributes)
Export the given service to this scope with the associated attributes.

Parameters:

attributes - service attributes
Returns:
exported service handle, null if the scope is not interested
